channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Sing-Song Gal
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Henri St. Maur)
item.description: "This isn't a regular detective job I called you about," the night club singer told Hodgson. "It's not a dead body and a lot of clues and all that stuff." That's what she thought, but it didn't take long for him to prove her wrong!
